`,(0,r.jsx)(e.pre,{live:!0,children:(0,r.jsx)(e.code,{className:"language-js",children:`let arr = [1, 2, 3];

// Add elements
arr.push(4); // [1, 2, 3, 4]
arr.unshift(0); // [0, 1, 2, 3, 4]
arr.splice(2, 0, 1.5); // [0, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4]

// Remove elements
arr.pop(); // [0, 1, 1.5, 2, 3]
arr.shift(); // [1, 1.5, 2, 3]
arr.splice(1, 1); // [1, 2, 3]

// Update elements

console.log(arr); // Final state: [1, 5, 3]
`})}),`
